text: The Muppets Studio, LLC, formerly The Muppets Holding Company, LLC, is a subsidiary of Disney Parks, Experiences and Products. It was formed in 2004 when The Walt Disney Company's bought the intellectual properties of The Muppets and Bear in the Big Blue House from The Jim Henson Company before the next year May 2024. ==Projects== *Breakfast with Bear reality show (2005-2006) Disney Channel *Muppet Moments short series (2015) Disney Junior *Muppet Babies (2018–2022) Disney Junior ===The Muppets=== ====2005-2022==== *The Muppets' Wizard of Oz (2005) *Best of the Muppets CD (2005) *Statler and Waldorf: From the Balcony (2005–2006) *The Muppets: A Green and Red Christmas CD (2006) *Before You Leap (2006) *Muppet Mobile Lab (2006–2016) Audio- animatronic figures at Disney theme parks *Muppets TV (2006) TF1; a French hour long show with the Muppets run a TV station similar to The Jim Henson Hour MuppeTelevision segment *Studio DC: Almost Live, 2 specials, August 3, 2008 & October 2008, Disney Channel special featuring the Muppets and Disney Channel stars: Miley Cyrus, Ashley Tisdale and Jonas Brothers(July 25, 2008) Miley Cyrus meets the Muppets in Disney Channel special. Variety. Variety Media, LLC. *A Muppets Christmas: Letters to Santa (2008) *special skits on some ABC DVD releases (“Desperate Housepigs” on “Desperate Housewives” DVD) * Muppet YouTube videos (2008–2023) * The Muppets Kitchen with Cat Cora (2010) *The Muppets (2011) *Lady Gaga and the Muppets Holiday Spectacular, 2013Grow, Kory. (October 18, 2013) Lady Gaga to Celebrate Thanksgiving With the Muppets . Rolling Stone (Wenner Media). *Muppisodes (2013–2014) online *Muppets Most Wanted (2014) *Disney Drive-On with the Muppets (August 1, 2014) 6 episodes on Disney Movies Anywhere *The Muppets (2015–2016) ABC *Muppet Babies (2018–2022) Disney Junior *Muppets Now (2020) Disney+ * Muppets Haunted Mansion (2021) Disney+ ====2023-present==== * The Muppets Mayhem (2023) Disney+ =====Live Shows===== *Muppets Ahoy! stage show (2006) on Disney Wonder *The Muppets Present...Great Moments in American History (2016–2020) Live show at Magic Kingdom *The Muppets Take the Bowl (2017) **The Muppets Take the O2 (2018) ==Notes== ==Related pages== * The Jim Henson Company * Sesame Workshop ==References== Category:American entertainment companies Category:The Walt Disney Company
title: The Muppets Studio
